snippet: The business news network signed on Jim Ackerman in an effort to jump-start its own plan for reality shows, which could become a presence in its prime-time lineup.
abstract: The business news network signed on Jim Ackerman in an effort to jump-start its own plan for reality shows, which could become a presence in its prime-time lineup.
lead_paragraph: CNBC might be turning Wall Street bankers into reality show stars.

headline.main: CNBC Hires VH1 Executive to Help Develop Reality Shows
